TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Tab/TopTabItemLeftEdge extends System.Object

summary.span: 針對與其他索引標籤控制項 (Tab Control) 共用下框線和右框線的索引標籤控制項，就它的每個狀態提供 物件。

span.span: Provides objects for each state of a tab control that shares its bottom and right borders with other tab controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一個屬性的類別會傳回共用下框線和右框線與其他索引標籤控制項索引標籤控制項的不同狀態。Each property of the class returns a for a different state of a tab control that shares its bottom and right borders with other tab controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與傳回屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItemLeftEdge1`方法從事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItemLeftEdge1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#126](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#126)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#126](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#126)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

summary.span: 取得視覺化樣式項目，表示停用的索引標籤控制項 (與其他索引標籤控制項共用下框線和右框線)。

span.span: Gets a visual style element that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom and right borders with other tab controls.

value.span: ，表示停用的索引標籤控制項 (與其他索引標籤控制項共用下框線和右框線)。

span.span: A that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom and right borders with other tab controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用傳回屬性以建立。You can use the returned by the property to create a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與傳回屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItemLeftEdge4`方法從事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItemLeftEdge4` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as .
